div.p: I just feel very, very blessed that I’ve got a lovely partner, a strong family, immediate family, I’ve got some loyal friends now,
I lost a lot of friends when I got out of the streets, I was called a lot of names “oh you sell-out you’re not like you used to be”.
If people say to me “how do you feel?” I just feel happy do you know what I mean? I just feel when people say to me
I’m not rich, I’m not poor, I’m just happy do you know what I mean? I couldn’t go out and buy a 5 or 10 grand car
if I wanted to at the moment or I couldn’t go out and book a round the world holiday but I can save for it;
people say “Del you’re going to be a real good dad” and I’m like “why?” and “it’s because of what you do for a job”.
And I’m like “well OK hopefully I can inspire my children but they might be like do you know what, I respect what you do dad
and mum but do you know what I want to be a gang banger”. So as much as people say “you’re going to be brilliant”
I would like to think that I’m going to be a good parent.
Mountain biking, I do a lot of off-road mountain biking, not as much as I would like to; running, that’s my real big...
my mates call me the “Black Forest Gump”. Yeah I love road running, that’s my massive de-stress and just spending time
with my partner, she works for a charity called Winston’s Wish, one of the biggest UK charities for bereavement, she’s
a practitioner so she works with like all military families and stuff like that. Yeah, family time, every now and again
might go out to the pub with the boys have a few...
